meanings.definition: Ineffective or improper management of resources or affairs.
meanings.sent1: The mismanagement of funds led to financial problems for the company.
meanings.sent2: The mismanagement of the project resulted in delays and confusion.
meanings.sent3: The mismanagement of the picnic supplies left everyone hungry and disappointed.
meanings.sent4: Her mismanagement of time turned her schedule into a chaotic mess.
meanings.sent5: The mismanagement of the garden led to wilting plants and overgrown weeds.

meanings.definition: The act or instance of managing poorly or incompetently.
meanings.sent1: His mismanagement of the team caused conflicts and decreased productivity.
meanings.sent2: The mismanagement of the event led to a disorganized and stressful experience.
meanings.sent3: The mismanagement of the cookie baking contest resulted in burnt treats and upset participants.
meanings.sent4: Their mismanagement of the situation turned a small issue into a major crisis.
meanings.sent5: The mismanagement of the store led to lost inventory and unhappy customers.
